name: Rendang Ayam Negeri Sembilan
recipeIngredient: 1 chicken (about 1.5 kg, cut into bite sized pieces),
recipeInstructions: 1. Into a mixing bowl put chicken, 1 tsp salt, shallots, garlic lemongrass and group ingredients. Mix well and leave for 30 minutes.
2. Transfer the marinated meat to a pot and add coconut cream. Bring to a slow boil.
3. Add the turmeric leaves and simmer gently until the gravy is thick.
4. Stir in kerisik and salt to taste, then simmer until chicken is tender and very little gravy remains.
